Summary: not sure if rectangle or cigar shaped.about 6-10 extremely bright white lights on the bottom.
divs: sighting detailsi was on my balcony watching the planes go by - they were all very high in the sky going to and coming from midway airport. then a strange plane caught my eye- at first i thought it was a plane then realized it was not. it was headed toward midway airport.it was sort of shaped like a bus- but maybe 2-3 buses in length.i'm not sure if it was a rectangle or cigar shaped ufo.there were about 6-10 extremely bright white lights they were large & round all on the bottom in a straight line. maybe one or 2 lights was square. i saw one light flash once it was red or green and very tiny in the middle��� . it was rather low in the sky only about 1 tree height higher than the 3 story condo i live in and rather close. i saw it between 8-10pm aug 25 or 26 2008. it moved very slow the pace of a blimp. it was a very clear sky at night and very dark -you could see the stars in the sky.��� i called my husband to the balcony to look at it -we are on the top floor -and he said " oh that's a plane". i said well that plane has no wings on it so how it it flying?? he was proccupied with paperwork inside and did not realize what he saw and went back inside. it also made no engine noise or any noise at first for that matter. about a minute later i heard a low motor noise the kind you hear from a dishwasher motor without the water swishing sound. it moved too slow in the sky to be a plane - no plane moves that slow. the lights were so bright and it was such a dark night that i could not see the exact shape of the craft. but the lights were all in one straight line with no wings - i know for sure. and it was close enough for me to see it was not a blimp because i saw no such shape of a blimp on top. i went back inside to find my cell phone to take a picture when i returned it was gone.i was not scared because this is the 2nd time in my life i have seen a ufo. the 1st time i saw one i saw it land on the ground- back in the 1970's in ohio it was the round kind dark metallic slate\gray with 3 round lights one top one red one white and one green. it landed right next to a weeping willow tree and did not move one branch on the tree - at night. it was completely silent. i was studying how airplanes flew back then because i wanted to be a pilot someday. so i knew that was no technology we had anywhere on earth. i felt like it was using magnetic forces of some kind to move - this was just my initial thought when i saw it - i studied a lot of science and that was the first idea that popped into my head as i was wondering how it could be flying. i could be totally wrong - but i��� am just sharing my initial thought at the time. it was there for about 1 minute then flew away. i was scared and very curious - after telling my brother and he said "yea right",i never told anyone else because i did not want people to think i was crazy.
